title: Saffire - 1992 - Broadcasting FLAC
description:
Saffire - 1992 - Broadcasting

Between Hot Flash and Broadcasting, Saffire lost a bassist, but added a mandolinist, fiddler, organist, and electric guitarist, which gives Broadcasting a fuller, richer sound. Fortunately, that hasn't distracted attention from the bawdy, sassy vocals of Ann Rabson and Gaye Adegbalola, who still exhibit a raw, natural charisma. And the material -- which ranges from fresh interpretations of warhorses from Louis Jordan and Hank Williams to clever originals -- is all first-rate, helping make the album one of the group's best efforts. (AllMusic)

17 - Shake the Dew Off the Lily

with
Larry Gray, Bass
Andra Faye McIntosh, Background Vocals,Mandolin on Is You Is Or Is You Ain't My Baby? and Shake The Dew Off The Lily, Fiddle on Miz Thang
